descriptions: No attempt to analyze data or identify material properties.
Attempts to analyze data but fails to correctly identify relevant properties of the materials.
Analyzes data and identifies at least one relevant material property but struggles with connecting it to the intended purpose.
Analyzes data, identifies relevant material properties, and makes a basic connection to the intended purpose.
Analyzes data, identifies relevant material properties, and clearly connects these properties to the suitability for the intended purpose.

Analyzes data thoroughly, identifies all relevant material properties, clearly and accurately connects these properties to the suitability for the intended purpose, and provides justification for the selection.
Demonstrates no understanding of the relationship between material properties and their suitability for specific purposes.
Demonstrates a limited understanding of the relationship between material properties and their suitability for specific purposes.
Shows some understanding of how material properties relate to their suitability for specific purposes, but with significant gaps.
Demonstrates a satisfactory understanding of how material properties relate to their suitability for specific purposes.
Demonstrates a strong understanding of how material properties relate to their suitability for specific purposes, providing clear examples.
Demonstrates a comprehensive and nuanced understanding of how material properties relate to their suitability for specific purposes, including insightful examples and justifications.
Unable to connect data analysis to the cause-effect relationship between material properties and intended use.
Weak attempt to link data analysis to cause-effect relationships.  Does not clearly articulate why a material property makes the material adequate for the stated intended purpose.
Identifies a simple cause-effect relationship, for instance, stronger materials are good for holding a heavy load, but fails to account for second order effects.
Designs a test that would provide data that demonstrates a cause-effect relationship between material properties and intended use. May not demonstrate a full command.
Designs a strong test and applies it to determine the cause-effect relationship between material properties and intended use.
Designs a strong test and applies it to determine the cause-effect relationship between material properties and intended use.  Can expand on the limits of the experimental design.
